text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
yesterday I wrote the last sections on our Requirements specification
attachments.text: yesterday I wrote the last sections on our Requirements specification
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today I will setup the next sprint, review Samirs changes, have a meeting with a test user, where we go through the UI, after that I will look into, getting the kubernetes up and running with our first service, the users service.
attachments.text: Today I will setup the next sprint, review Samirs changes, have a meeting with a test user, where we go through the UI, after that I will look into, getting the kubernetes up and running with our first service, the users service.
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
